identifiers_discovery.name: Identifiers & Discovery
identifiers_discovery.title: Identifiers & Discovery Working Group
identifiers_discovery.scope: The ID WG is focused on developing the foundational elements of decentralized identifiers (DIDs) and how they can be discovered and resolved across different systems.

DID Core.desc: Contributing to the W3C DID Core specification

claims_credentials.name: Claims & Credentials
claims_credentials.title: Claims & Credentials Working Group
claims_credentials.scope: The C&C WG focuses on the development of standards and technologies for verifiable credentials and claims in decentralized identity systems.

storage_compute.name: Storage & Compute
storage_compute.title: Storage & Compute Working Group
storage_compute.scope: The SC WG works on standards and protocols for secure data storage and computation in decentralized identity systems.

authentication.name: Authentication
authentication.title: Authentication Working Group
authentication.scope: The Auth WG develops protocols and standards for authentication using decentralized identifiers and verifiable credentials.

did_comm.name: DID Communication
did_comm.title: DID Communication Working Group
did_comm.scope: The DIDComm WG focuses on developing protocols for secure communication between DID-identified entities.

sidetree.name: Sidetree
sidetree.title: Sidetree Protocol Working Group
sidetree.scope: The Sidetree WG develops and maintains the Sidetree protocol for scalable DID operations.

secure_data_storage.name: Secure Data Storage
secure_data_storage.title: Secure Data Storage Working Group
secure_data_storage.scope: The SDS WG develops specifications and protocols for secure, privacy-preserving data storage in decentralized systems.

interop.name: Interoperability
interop.title: Interoperability Working Group
interop.scope: Community collaboration and project management on Interoperability. Develop and publish definitions of success with respect to business interoperability, at the highest level.

Bonnie Yau.title: VP Technology and Innovation @ Digital Identity Lab Canada

glossary.name: Glossary
glossary.title: Glossary Project
glossary.scope: The goal of this project is to facilitate the emergence of contextualized vocabulary that is widely accepted across the decentralized identity community/industry.
